attributes.action: review the current process of extending leases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current process of extending leases, particularly for properties based in London and Greater London, is open to abuse/ corruption. The process needs to be made fairer for applicants - in terms of the length of time it should take, and in terms of the overall cost. It needs a tighter reign and a fair level of control at government level.
